Title: The Rugrats Movie
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Musical
Writer: David N. Weiss, J. David Stem, Arlene Klasky (based on the television series created by), Gabor Csupo (creator "Rugrats"), Paul Germain (based on the television series created by)
Actors: Elizabeth Daily, Christine Cavanaugh, Kath Soucie, Melanie Chartoff
Plot: Tommy, Chuckie, Phil, Lil and newborn baby Dil get lost in the forest.
